meanings.definition: Having a more traditional or authentic sound or style, especially in music.
meanings.sent1: The rootsier music reminded me of old times.
meanings.sent2: The band's rootsier approach to their new album pleased their long-time fans.
meanings.sent3: The rootsier tunes made everyone at the party start dancing.

meanings.sent5: The rootsier melodies transported me back to my childhood.
